data.message: They should go back to glass bottles  which  you take back to the shop and get a few pence off your next purchase  and the glass bottles get reused they did that when I was a kid

replies.message: Hi Phil, thanks for getting in touch. We support any well-thought through initiative which will improve recovering and recycling rates but ultimately the introduction of a deposit returns scheme lies with the Governments of Great Britain. We are going to carry out our own research to test whether incentives help improve recycling rates and reduce litter For more info, please visit: http://spr.ly/61848qFra
